segments.text: Oh, this is quite the show!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at the cleverness of these kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're totally taking advantage of their mother's distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at that little guy on the stool, so determined to get those cookies!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching for that cookie jar, what a little rascal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the sister is reaching up, palm open, is just too cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've got a whole operation going on here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame about the overflowing sink; that's going to be a problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But honestly, the sheer audacity of the children is rather delightful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool does look a bit unstable, I must admit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, a well-deserved cookie for such an elaborate plan, I'd say.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're going to have quite the story to tell, if they don't get caught first.
segments.speaker: PAR
